1.description and explanation: This is a large construction vehicle, characterized by its heavy-duty structure and equipment, which is typically used for construction tasks such as lifting, digging, or carrying heavy materials. The presence of this vehicle in the vicinity of the roadway indicates that there may be road work ahead. The driver of the ego car must be prepared to slow down, obey any temporary traffic signals or signs, and be cautious of workers and additional construction machinery in the area. Additionally, alterations to normal traffic patterns may require the driver to follow detours or use caution while passing the construction site.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the dump truck, and do not attempt to overtake unless the truck returns fully to its lane and there is clear visibility and space to do so safely. Be ready to merge to the left side of the lane to avoid being too close to the construction vehicle, while also being mindful of any potential obstructions or changes in road conditions indicated by the traffic cones. Always be prepared for unexpected movements from the construction vehicle and continue to monitor for any additional road signs or signals that may provide further instructions.
